about_page.hero_lead: Arslan Tech is a specialized IT solutions company helping businesses build secure, flexible infrastructure that supports their growth.
about_page.intro_title: A tech partner close to your reality
about_page.intro_lead: We work with SMEs and organizations that need a technical partner who understands their daily challenges and delivers practical solutions, not just products.
about_page.intro_badge_text: Hundreds of completed projects in CCTV, networking, call center systems, and low-voltage solutions.
about_page.vision_p1: To be the preferred technology partner for companies seeking secure and flexible solutions that grow with them long-term.
about_page.vision_p2: We focus on building stable infrastructure that reduces downtime and boosts your team's productivity.
about_page.mission_p: Turning technology from a burden into a helpful tool for management, sales, and customer service.
about_page.mission_item1: Designing solutions that match the size and nature of each business.
about_page.mission_item2: Providing ongoing technical support, not just a one-time installation.
about_page.mission_item3: Simplifying systems as much as possible for everyday use.
about_page.why_item1_text: We help you choose the right solution before buying or installing, so you avoid unnecessary costs.
about_page.why_item2_text: We focus on implementation quality and documentation so your systems are easy to extend and maintain.
about_page.why_item3_text: A support team ready for questions and incidents, with maintenance contracts that match your business size.
about_page.stat_years_text: Operational experience across many implementation, commissioning and support projects.
about_page.stat_projects_text: Projects in sectors like restaurants, offices, retail stores and factories.
about_page.stat_clients_text: Businesses that rely on us to run and monitor their technical systems.
about_page.cta_text: Book a quick call with the Arslan Tech team to review your current setup and propose practical, budget-friendly solutions.

products.intro_title: Contact us for the best prices
products.intro_lead: We provide a wide range of technical solutions and devices to support your business growth and improve daily performance.
products.attendance_desc: Manage work time accurately and professionally with fingerprint and face recognition devices, ensuring effective employee attendance management.
products.computers_desc: Latest desktop computers and powerful laptops that meet all your needs.
products.printers_desc: Discover a range of printers suitable for your work environment, from high-speed printing to high-precision scanning and copying.
products.pbx_desc: Provide integrated communication solutions for your company using modern PBX devices to connect departments and improve call quality.
products.callcenter_desc: Develop your call center with the latest call center systems and phones that ensure smooth communication with your customers.
products.servers_desc: Choose reliable and high-performance servers to store your data and process your company's information securely and at ultra-fast speed.
products.racks_desc: Organize and secure your network using racks and patch panels designed to provide protection and manage cables effectively and professionally.
products.network_desc: Get fast and stable network connectivity through our collection of high-efficiency switches and routers.
products.cctv_desc: Provide the highest levels of security for your facility or home with the latest high-resolution surveillance cameras and advanced night vision.

academy_page.hero_title: Arslan Academy | Specialized Training in Low Current, Networking and IT Services
academy_page.hero_lead: At Arslan Academy, we believe knowledge is the foundation of success. Alongside our comprehensive infrastructure, networking and IT solutions, we decided to share our extensive expertise with young professionals through practical and professional training programs.

academy_page.adv_1_text: Gain practical experience by working on real projects that reflect market requirements.
academy_page.adv_2_text: Learn from specialized experts with years of practical experience in the field.
academy_page.adv_3_title: Updated content according to market requirements
academy_page.adv_3_text: Continuously updated training programs keeping pace with the latest developments and technologies.
academy_page.adv_4_text: Receive certified certificates that enhance your job market opportunities and prove your competence.

services_page.section_subtitle: We combine deep expertise with modern technology to deliver exceptional services that drive your business forward

webdesign.faq_q1: How long does the website take?
webdesign.faq_a1: Usually 10â€“20 days depending on content size and required features.
webdesign.faq_q2: Do I provide content and images?
webdesign.faq_a2: We provide templates and sample copy and can help select suitable images.
webdesign.faq_a3: Yes, we support Arabic and English with a simple translation structure.
webdesign.faq_q4: Do you provide hosting and domain?
webdesign.faq_a4: We can manage hosting and domain for you or work with your current provider.
